topic.title: I use another ID, ZeroMe ask me to create profile again.
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: rev3550
  * Operating system: windows & Android
  * Web browser: windows firefox61 & Android Chrome
  * Tor status: not available
  * Opened port: no

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
When I copy another ZeroID to /data, restart ZeroNet, go to ZeroMe, it ask me to create profile again, but I have created profile before. if I create profile again, all my posts data are losed. I rebuilt ZeroMe.db is NOT work.

topic.title: Why ZeroNet cann't share Chinese users' tracker peers for Chinese users?
topic.body: All the shared ` zero://... ` trackers peers on my client are outside China uesrs' peers.
